text:
Something interesting I have find out:
if I use `|selectattr` instead looping an array it won't give all the data as the looping does. Just to give some extra info for debug: I am using `string_containing` condition and looking for `params` data from a CM in `all_widgets`.
<@U26B530N6> related to the a few days ago issue.
<@U6GNQ7JBU> tagging you because :male_mage::robot_face: reasons (just kidding, but was checking the jinjava github and you were the last one pulling there)
FYI <@U22PJPGK0>
Can you put up an issue in <https://github.com/HubSpot/jinjava/issues> with an example test case so we can reproduce?
trying to take a post summary and split it at a ‘:’, then make sure nothing after that shows, but im struggling with the hubl for that, any ideas?
We had to stop using rich text areas.
For embeds if we wanted the popovers.
